column1: Received a sample of the Am and PM Absolutely Ageless face moisturizers and they were wonderful! I have sensitive skin and this product didn't bother it all. Tried an off brand and my skin was breaking out. Love Aveeno! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The use of Aveeno Absolutely Ageless Leave On Day Mask Lotion Broad Spectrum SPF 30 has made my skin feeling so rejuvinated and renewed. Using this product has my my skin feel years younger as well as protecting it while in the sun. I highly recommend this product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The product goes on smoothly. It does not look or feel oily but is a great moisturizer. I have used the product daily for a few weeks now. I have combination skin which at times is sensitive. I had no issues with irritation with this product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Living in an industrial part of Brooklyn, I am always concerned with the air quality in my area. Between the ingredients and the SPF 30, I feel like this was made for me! I absolutely love this product! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Texas -100 degrees hot, humid weather a facial moisturizer with a SPF 30 is a must. This moisturizer is great since it doesn't melt in the heat or cause a horrible oily feeling. I like that we can use Aveeno Absolutely ageless leave-on day mask lotion under eyes and neck too. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I don't like the phrase "of a certain age"...but I like it even less when my grandson says, "Hey Nana, your skin feels like a dinosaur!" (How does he know? Really??) But this stuff really WORKS!!! It doesn't turn back the clock decades but it quenches
the skin with no greasy feel. It moisturizes so well. I love it! This is really a great product!

My biggest take away from using the Aveeno Absolutely Ageless Leave-On Day Mask is the wonderful smell - they nailed the blackberry scent and I look forward to it in the mornings! I'm big on sunscreen every day, and the added pollutant protection is great with this product. Plus, did I mention the smell is wonderful?? [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Hours from initial use, face broke out in rash and pimples. Couldn't hide it with make up. I've been using Aveeno face products for months now and didn't think it was the cause. I will never use this product again.

I absolutely loved the product. When I first tried it, I felt if a cool breeze was flashing by. I like very much because it protects me from UV lights. Another reason is that it keeps my skin moisturized. The texture and the scent was very light. It does not leave my face feeling greasy. Just goes on right and feels just right. Feels my face hydrated all day. Purchased the product all ready. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

love the feel of this product. i love aveeno products and im glad they add sunscreen to their facial lotions and mask! will definitely keep getting this! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

felt good. didn't make me break out. worked very well under my make up. for all these reasons and all the added benefits the product claims, i would definitely purchase (and like will) this product [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Way too much fragrance; Need to make it free of perfumes as your delicate facial skin has no need for those chemicals. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
It leaves your skin smooth, moisturized, tones down wrinkles. Skin feels soft not tight all day long. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
After using this lotion as a base for my foundation, I found that my skin was way softer than normal! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I absolutely love this face lotion. It's very lightweight, spreads over the face so nicely, smells great while adding a nice glow. Best product in a while.

I am a long time use of Aveeno products and trust them as skin care professionals. I love the way this product feels and smells. However after just 2 uses my cheeks become bright red and have a burning sensation. My skin has clearly had a reaction to something in this product and my skin is welped.
I would like to be contacted by the company.

This lotion-mask is very hydrating. If your skin is on the oilier side, I would avoid the T-Zone area. It smells wonderful (it smells like blackberry smoothies) but if you have allergies to scent it might not be for you since it's a bit overpowering. I like that it has SPF which is super important. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was pleasantly surprised how much I liked this product. It went on light and smelled delicious. I used as a two-in-one moisturizer and sunscreen. Normally, I have to use two products, but this sufficed as one. I love that it has superfoods extracts to help fight aging through pollutants. Pretty awesome, if you ask me! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The product is easy to apply and is moisturizing. A dab goes a long way. My skin easily absorbs the lotion and makes my skin very soft. Not messy, can very easily be applied from the palm of your hand, using your finger tips. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I used Aveeno Absolutely Ageless Leave-On Day Mask Lotion and was very pleased with the results. I go walking in the morning and have noticed that my skin is not as dry as it usually is. The sun really dried out my skin. I have noticed that my skin is getting a glow to it and wrinkles are less noticeable. I would recommend this product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I used the Aveeno Absolutely Ageless Day Mask over a period of 1 week. I did notice a difference in the texture of my skin. This day mask made my skin more supple and moisturized all day long. I will be purchasing this mask in the future. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Lightweight, smooth, and non greasy. One of the best SPF lotions made by Aveeno.
I bought this a month ago and my skin feels gooder than before [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Really like this, didn't leave my face feeling greasy or heavy with product [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I like that this products has the benefits of spf and moisturizer. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Great product; the older I get the more important skin care is to me. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I like Aveeno products and this one was what I expected. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I saw huge difference in my skin. It looked a lot smoother and gave my face a natural glow to it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Product sunk in leaving no greasy feeling, smells great too [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I really liked this cream. It was not too heavy, had a nice scent, and worked well. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I didn't think it would work for my skin. After trying it I thought it was okay. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I would have given it a five but my face broke out. I'm in my early 50's and never break out. I love the feel and the price but I'm going to try it again.
My skin felt beautiful after putting this on! Loved the fact that it has SPF and the smell was fruitful and addicting! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I really liked this product. It's light non greasy and didn't make me break out at all. I have very sensitive skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Love Aveeno First and foremost and then there's Ageless Leave -on Day Mask Lotion Broad Spectrum SPF 30 makes it much more easier for me to use and is just more Better for my skin [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love this! It doesn't leave your face feeling oily or greasy but it does help you to look younger by helping reduce fine lines and wrinkles! Aveeno products are great products. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This won't replace my sunscreen. For a serious hike, etc. I would want something stronger than SPF 30, but this will replace my daily moisturizer. You are getting enough sun protection for casual exposure plus a very nice textured, easily absorbed moisturizer. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Aveeno is the definite product for me and I enjoyed using it.The sample turned one day of dryness and sun damage to a better texture...Just the sample wow...I will buy more and tell friends the great improvement and wait for compliments! thanks Aveeno. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using Aveeno Absolutely Ageless every day for a week and I can definitely see and feel a difference. My face feels softer and the deep lines in my face are much less defined. Overall, I am very pleased with it and I will definitely keep this on hand. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I did not prefer the Aveeno Absolutely Ageless Leave-On Day Mask Lotion, it left my skin feeling oily and I did not notice any benefit to my skin after using the product for several days. I feel horrible putting a product down but it's my job in giving a 100% honest reveiew. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I live this product. Only thing is it is a little bit pricey for me to keep buying.
Honestly loved it, go cruelty free and I'll buy! Also trying to use more natural, clean products. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
It is an okay product but as a user of Aveeno primarily, I do not think that this product is up to their usual standards. Not very impressive to me.
Thank you so much for the absolutely ageless sample! Felt very fresh and definitely one of my favorites! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Was surprised how much I like this product. My skin felt wonderful all day. Wish it had a higher SPF. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I tend to only use and trust organic skincare products. I was pleasantly surprised by the results. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love how this product feels and smells. Can't wait to pick it up in store to use daily. It worked well with my makeup. I always use spf on my face and I like that it will help combat aging. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I love the way it looks and feels. It leaves my skin softer and I swear I have less visible lines and wrinkles especially around my eyes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The cream is light, not sticky. It has a pleasant smell. I can notice the sunscreen is working because my facial skin doesn't darken when I walk without a hat. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I loved the fact this lotion doesn't make your skin feel greasy. Most lotions give me a shiny look or make my face break out. This has done neither! I love it so far! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Unfortunately I have sensitive skin and broke out in a rash 24 hours after using Aveeno Absolutely Ageless. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This lotion is very light, blends in easily, leaves my face feeling soft. The SPF 30 is a huge bonus. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really like how it made my skin feel soft and refreshed. Not greasy or oily at all. Plus it has a very nice scent not like some lotions that smell bad. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was very surprised that I liked this product. I have been purchasing high end products and I have found that I like the texture of this product over what I am currently using. I also like the spf 30 along with the fact that it is light weight and does not feel greasy. I perspire quite a bit and found that my skin is not breaking out by using this. Love this new product [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Very light sense which is good since I can't handle a heavy sense. It is easy to apply. It is not oily or greasy when applying to my face. My face does not feel like I have apply something heavy. I can apply my makeup on top of the cream. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Aveeno® Absolutely Ageless® Leave-on Day Mask Lotion Broad Spectrum SPF 30 is light and makes your face flawless under makeup. It does not leave a greasy residue feeling or that tightness. I would recommend this product [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I am very pleased with the Aveeno® Absolutely Ageless® Leave-on Day Mask Lotion Broad Spectrum SPF 30. It is a very lightweight and easy to apply lotion. It is not sticky or tacky. It feels almost invisible on the skin. I really like how soft and beautiful it makes my skin. I spend a lot of time outdoors in tropical weather so having the SPF 30 in the lotion is very convenient and beneficial. This product is very good and I recommend it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love all Aveeno products. At first the name kind of threw me and I expected something that would be heavy. It wasn't at all. I like that it has the broad spectrum SPF protection as I desperately need it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I just love the way Aveeno Ageless Leave-on Day Mask Lotion feels on my face. It is smooth not heavy at all. And it last great, with what ever the weather that you wear it... Will definitely buy and add to my routine. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love the way my face feels after using it for several days. I live in a harsh dry climate and my skin is always so dry. This mask leaves my skin so soft and moisturized. The SPF is an added bonus. I will defiantly be buying this in the future. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

As usual, Aveeno Day mask is easy to use, just put it on as it it were part of your daily makeup routine and forget about it for the rest of the day. It's that easy. Plus it has sunscreen so there's no extra step. Love it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I didn't have much luck with this product. I felt the Aveeno Absolutely Ageless Leave-on Day Mask Lotion Broad Spectrum SPF 30 made my facial skin feel dry. I'm not certain if it was due to the SPF of 30. I used this product for two weeks, but didn't notice any difference. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I tried a sample of the Aveeno Absolutely Ageless Leave-on Day Mask Lotion with broad spectrum SPF30. This worked wonderfully to help reduce my fine lines and wrinkles to wear under my makeup while also providing a great SPF sun protection. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The reason why I enjoyed trying the Aveeno Absolutely Ageless lotion is because some I have tried leave my skin greasy feeling. Others irritated or not enough relief but this did all and then some. It felt very soothing and I am happy that I had a chance to try it. I would recommend it for almost anyone. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love Aveeno Absolutely Ageless leave on day mask lotion! My skin feels wonderful and in 4 days I saw a big improvement , especially under my eye area and lips! I will definitely be purchasing this product ! Thanks for allowing me the opportunity to try before I buy! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Aveeno Absolutely Ageless Leave on Day Mask Lotion Broad Spectrum SPF 30 is one of the best, or should I say is the best I have used! It leaves my skin feeling fresh and non greasy! It is light weight and a subtle little pleasant fragrance. I have went and bought some after using and is one that I will continue to buy and recommend to others [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received Aveeno Absolutely Ageless Leave-on Day Mask Lotion a couple of weeks ago. I started using it and I notice that some of the wrinkles around my eyes were disappearing and my face becoming more smoother. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I JUST LOVE THE AVEENO ABSOLUTELY AGELESS LEAVE-ON DAY MASK LOTION BROAD SPECTRUM SPF 30. IT FEELS GREAT AND I NOTICE LESS LINES ON FACE LIKE AROUND THE EYES AND LESS FROWN LINES. MY FACE IS SOFT AND I LOOK YOUNGER. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This moisturizing lotion helps protect the skin from the elements and provides effective protection against sun exposure. This lotion fulfills multiple functions perfectly, protects me from the sun, moisturizes my skin and makes me look young and luminous.
The formula is super lightweight and non-greasy, hypoallergenic and works perfectly with makeup. I'm impressed with the quality of this lotion. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This day mask lotion is wonderful! My skin looks great, radiant, no oily. My face felts great with and is protect against the UV light. Works amazing with my make up. Aveeno® Absolutely Ageless® Leave-on Day Mask Lotion Broad Spectrum SPF 30 have a soft and nice smell that I love and definitely I would recommended it to my friends and co-workers. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love the idea of pre-protecting my skin! I want to fight the signs of environmental damage, signs of aging, and sun. The SPF30 makes it easy to be protected while using a regular moisturizing product. I like the lightweight formula, it goes on my skin smooth and absorbs well and does not feel sticky. It also leaves my face feeling soft, hydrated, and smooth. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The Aveeno Absolutely Ageless Leave-on Day Mask Lotion I received to test and review for free from Home Tester club is a great product. I'm glad it has Broad spectrum SPF 30 in it. I try to use products that have sunscreen in them. This left my skin feeling soft and has reduced my fine lines & wrinkles. It feels like you have nothing on your face & is not greasy! Works well with make up on. I recommended this to my friends and family. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I am 59 years old and have very dry skin that gets worse in the winter, so was pleased to try this product! I trust the Aveeno brand and was curious how different this product would be as it is a "leave-on" day mask. I also like the fact that it has a broad spectrum SPF 30, because I am in the sun almost daily. I immediately felt a difference in this product with it's hydrating benefits and no-greasy feel to the touch. I also like the scent. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I had a great experience with the Aveeno Absolutely Ageless product. At first I was reluctant because of the description: Leave-on day mask. I thought I would feel it on my skin all day, but that wasn't the case. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I loved the way Aveeno Absolutely Ageless Leave on Day Mask Lotion Broad Spectrum SPF 30 made my skin feel. It made it feel so soft and the lotion was so light feeling and it didn't have to worry about the sun because it had sunscreen already added so I could wear it outside not to worry about damaging sun effects. Great product!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I tried AVEENO ABSOLUTELY AGELESS LEAVE ON DAY MASK LOTION BROAD SPECTRUM SPF 30 for 1 week. I loved the feel. Not greasy or heavy feeling. I work where it is very warm. Most products clog my pores. Not Absolutely Ageless. my skin feels dewy all day long. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Great product that works to help take away my fine lines and wrinkles especially around my eye and cheek area. I love that it already has a SPF in it, so need for me to use another product for that. It has a pleasant smell ( really not much of one ) . It feel great on your skin and is lightweight. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have noticed a visible difference in my fine lines. If you have a oily face I would recommend rubbing in well. It may cause you to look oily when you put your makeup on. I use on my neck and chest area as well as my face. I would definitely recommend to friends and family. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received Aveeno Absolutely Ageless Leave-on Day Mask Lotion Broad Spectrum SPF30 for free from Home Tester Club to evaluate and review. After trying the product for a week or so, I like that it goes on and blends in easily, is light weight and leaves my skin smooth and very soft along with the benefit of a sunscreen and reducing fine lines and wrinkles. Overall, I have notice an improvement in my facial skin and find this Aveeno produce to be of good quality. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This is perfect for wearing under makeup. It is not greasy so makeup goes on smooth over the top of it. There is not a lot of scent to it, which is a good thing. The scent that it does have is pleasant. It did not make my face breakout. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I may not have used it long enough to see the results of fine lines and wrinkles. However, I do I really like the product. I have combination skin and most moisturizers moisturize my dry spots but break me out and others. This product did not do that. It moisturized without breakouts. It feels as if it creates a protective barrier but is not greasy or have a film like texture. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was given the opportunity by the Hometesterclub.com to home test Aveeno® Absolutely Ageless Leave-on Day Mask Lotion. This product pasted the main problem I have with any facial products. They'er always to oily. This didn't leave my face greasy at all. It was easy to apply and I love the mild pleasant scent. It kept my face moisturized and the lines around my mouth weren't as pronounced. So I think I'll be using this for awhile. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I tried this after receiving the free sample and I was surprised by the way it felt on my skin. I was delighted that is wasn't a greasy feeling and wasn't necessary to reapply as so many of this type product often makes me do. I liked that it wasn't heavy on my skin and it absorbed really quickly. I will continue to use the remainder of the product and hope that it makes an overall difference to my skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love that the product sinks right into my skin. It's very light and makes my skin feel silky. It lasts all day so I never have to reapply it. It has a light scent, which I don't mind, but it might be too strong for those who don't care for scented lotions. Overall, I'm really pleased with this lotion. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This rich and creamy lotion applies and spread easy. It does not require a lot of the lotion either approximately a dime size amount. I replaced my daily moisturizer and sunscreen with this 1 product, I also noticed a difference in my skin around day 10. It appeared to plump my skin and softened my lines some. The bottle is easy to use with a push top for dispensing lotion. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The first thing I noticed was that it didnt leave my face looking greasy.Soaked in well and made my face feel smooth and soft.Depending on the price I would probably buy it. Is a good name brand and anything with sunscreen in it adds to the benefits! Thank you! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love this product. My skin feels soft and moisturized without having a greasy feeling. It absorbs great into my skin. It also gives me protection from the sun. I will buy this again because it is effective and feels light on my skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really enjoyed the fact that it was not too greasy on my face, it soaked into my skin right away and did not make my skin "shiny." It was quite comforting to put on. Not sure if I really noticed any change in my fine lines but the product is definitely worth using because it kept me moisturized throughout the entire day and in this cold winter weather, that's a great positive! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love this product very light weight. Goes on very smooth and stays on. As I continue to use this I hope to see great improvement in my skin. I love that it leaves my skin soft, supple and hydrated and protects me from the sun as well. Excellent product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really like the consistency of the Aveeno Absolutely Ageless Leave-on Day Mask Lotion. It goes on evenly and easily. It has a slight scent which I like. I like that it has a Broad Spectrum SPF 30. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product went on smoothly and was a light weight texture. It also had a pleasant light scent & left my skin feeling refreshed and supple. I also liked the fact that it did reduce the apperance of my fine lines . I'm going to buy this product from now on because it really does make a real difference in my skin & texture. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I loved the non greasey feeling it was light and ok for the whole day i especially noticed that i was out in the cold the day prior to using and ended up with what looked like sunburn the day i used the leave on mask i again was out in the cold however i did not have red cheecks or forehead as i did prior to using so i would recommed if you like going out in the cold ad well as the sun [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The Aveeno Absolutely Ageless Leave On Day Mask is a great anti-aging lotion. I love Aveeno! They have very good quality products. This lotion goes on very nice and soaks in quickly. It doesn't leave my face feeling greasy. I put my foundation on right over the top of it. The scent smells delicious. It is made with Blackberry complex. It also has an SPF 30 to protect your skin from the sun. I would recommend this product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Aveeno Absolutely Ageless leave on Day Mask Lotion provided a base for the rest of my make up ! Where I live a sunscreen is needed all year long. My skin felt supple and dryness was gone within a few days ! Its long lasting too [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love this! It is light, non greasy, and refreshing to use. It made my face feel soft and supple. I don't have very many fine lines, but it does work in softening them. I would highly recommend this product, specially if you have sensitive skin as I do. Did not cause any redness. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Very smoothing for my skin with no oily or sticky residue. Light natural smell. My skin is very sensitive and often I feel dry and itchy. This product relieves this immediately and it has long lasting effects that literally make my day easier and more comfortable. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
It was easy to use. I was really impressed with how my skin looked.

Made my skin feel great. Didn't feel like I had a ton of stuff on my face. Most importantly it didn't break me out like some facial products do. I really liked the scent it has as well. I'd recommend this to anyone. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I liked that the bottle has a pump and blocks out the sun. The products has a fragrance but not overwhelming. The cream was not greasy , but it goes on thick really need to rub on to your skin , once I did that was able to apply my makeup. I found this effect and useful. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Fantastic mask lotion, that can double as a moisturizer with SPF 30 sunscreen. It moisturizes your face, without leaving it feeling oily. It visibly reduces the look of fine line and wrinkles, allowing your beauty to shine through. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was absolutely stunned how good this product is! The consistency is a lotion type, can't smell the SPF in the product. Behaves very well under makeup, does not disturb the foundation at all. It is not greasy and not oily and I definitely will purchase it as a primer. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

My sample from "Home Testers Club" has changed my idea of leave on lotion plus SPF. The new " Aveeno Absolutely Ageless Leave on Day Mask Lotion with Broad Spectrum SPF 30" is wonderful. I have used the same skin care line for 30 years and this may be the move I need to make for better skin health. The small fine lines seem smaller, the dull skin gone and soft to the touch skin left in its place. Thanks again Home Tester Club for the eye opener. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I tried the Aveeno Absolutely Ageless Leave-On Day Mask Lotion Broad Spectrum SPF 30 from Home Tester Club. It left my skin very smooth and did not leave white streaks and protected my skin from the sun. My skin felt smooth and rejuvinated. I love it and will be it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Aveeno® Absolutely Ageless® Leave-on Day Mask Lotion Broad Spectrum SPF 30 is a great product. The packaging was appealing. The scent was nice. I liked that It is non greasy and I can wear it under my makeup. It visibly reduced those fine lines and was easy to use. I would recommend this product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Most facial lotions that I apply are just to heavy feeling. This one was not and it also has SPF 30 in it. That is a win win for me. If I wear ones that are too heavy I end up sweating it off before the day is over. That leaves me with no protection at all. I love Aveeno Absolutely Ageless Leave-on Day Mask Lotion Broad Spectrum SPF 30 <3 I will tell my friends and family for sure [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think Aveeno has a great concept, unfortuantly my skin must not like it real well. I have developed white spots on my face plus some red ones, not sure what is going on, but my skin must not like it. Is easy to apply and has a nice scent. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love Aveeno Absolutely Ageless Leave on day mask Lotion. After using this product for just 1 week my skin is smoother, silkier and looks younger. Are my wrinkles gone? No, but the fine ones are smoother turning back the clock to a younger looking skin. I have tried other lotions but this is the best by far. I love the soft fragrance and I will absolutely recommend this product to my family and friends! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Home Tester Club sent me Aveeno Absolutely ageless Leave-on Day Mask Lotion Broad Spectrum SPF 30 to try. I LOVE this product! It really protected my face and kept it smooth and hydrated all day. It has only been 5 days but, I noticed a difference...it goes on smooth and has a very light scent going on. I think it smoothed out some of my fine lines time will tell...A great product! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love Avenno prodcuts and the Leave-on Day mask lotion is wonderful. It is light weight, non-greasy. It makes my skin feel soft and hydrated. I will continue to purchase after this bottle runs out. Absolutely Love-it ! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Aveeno Absolutely Ageless Leave-on Day Mask Lotion was a little too oily for my liking. I really don't like the feeling of having a oily coating on my face, so I keep wiping my face off. It wasn't for me ,but there are probably others who don't mind it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've used my Aveeno Absolutely Ageless lotion everyday for a week and I've noticed visible results in the depth of overall wrinkles and lines on my face. After looking at my before and after pics, with no makeup and using only this lotion each day, I can see much better results than before using this product. I'd recommend using it to other people since I can see results myself. Aveeno has another winner!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I found the Aveeno Absolutely Ageless Leave-on Day Mask Lotion to be very moisturizing. It helped my skin feel soft and smooth and absorbed quickly, without leaving any sticky feeling on the skin. I especially liked the soft, subtle scent.
I will definitely continue to use this product and will purchase it in the future. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

It's a light moisturizer with SPF 30 protection. Easy to dispense and easy to apply. Non-greasy. Has a slight scent to it. It absorbs into the skin in a timely manner. Had no adverse effects. It pills if you use too much. While it does hydrate I have not noticed any changes in reducing any fine lines or wrinkles but hoping to see a difference with continued use. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I loved how my skin felt refreshed when using this product. There was no greasy residue either. The lotion absorbed wonderfully into my skin, leaving me feeling clean and fresh! I highly recommend this product! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
